column1: I bought this after I noticed some things I didn't like due to getting older, it does work! Don't expect surgery results, but I noticed results immediately after the 1st use. I noticed the smile lines around my eyes weren't so noticeable, the laugh lines were less defined. All in all I am very happy with this Olay product.
I have been on this for years and my skin looks much younger than I actually am. Great products
I love this product it made my face so smooth and had it feeling so soft. It also had a really nice smell to it. I would recommend this to anyone
This cream is the best I've ever found and I'm sticking with it. Luxurious feel for a quality performance at a price I can reasonably afford. It really helps my desert-dry skin.
FIRST TIME AROUND WITH THIS PRODUCT...I NOTICE SOME DIFFERENCE ..I FIND DIFFERENT PRODUCTS WORK ON EACH OF US DIFFERENT... I GIVE THIS OLAY A EXCELLENT REVIEW
Of all the creams I have used in this price range, this Olay face cream seems to have the best effect on my skin. I like the Olay products very much and their prices are within reason.

I've used Olay Regenerist for years with excellent results. Jet offers this item at a good price and it beats traveling 30+ minutes to the nearest store - and then they may not have this item. Items ordered from Jet arrive quickly and within the promised time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

have used Olay products for years and continue with Regenerest - all my face products are this brand and keep my skin soft and plump - am 63 and people find it hard to believe - no crows feet yet and chin still pretty firm (treat neck same as face and no wrinkles at base of it either! Can't say enough about Regenerest
Best thing I've tried on my face.
Immediate difference in skin tone, smoother, tighter skin after every use

My mother used original since I can remember. At 86 she passed away and all people kept saying was she does not look 86 her skin is perfect hardly any wrinkles at all. I miss her terribly but every day I use my original Olay to keep her near. Thank you for still making it! I turn 50 this September and I got to say I don't look 50 :) I'm a true Olay girl just like my beautiful mãe was.

This cream is like a miracle in a bottle, I will never use anything else, since I started using this product my skin seems to be more firmer and definitely just beautiful clear skin. I have sensitive skin and this works perfect for me, I will never trust anything else, this one is definitely a keeper. Thanks Walmart.Com and Pharmapacks for such a great product at a reasonable rate, also thanks for fast shipping. I will definitely recommend this product to a friend.

I liked everything about the Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream. It goes on smoothly, is not greasy, leaves no after greasy feeling and your face feels very smooth. I also think that after a little over a week the lines around my mouth and chin have diminished a little. I am looking forward to seeing how this will continue. I am a senior citizen in Florida and dry skin from the sun and lines is a hazard.

I have used this product for a long time now and I really appreciate the fact it is fragrancy free and it keeps my skin (at 88) soft. I with more of your products were fragrant free since my eyes are so easily affected by even the slightest fragrance.
Great price and free shipping. I'm 60 look 40. Is it the face cream? I think so.
It really helps me look younger I tried another product priced the same. I went right back, after A month. I noticed my face didn't look as young. Never again will I switch.
Happy with product. Have used it before and my face feels smoother and softer. Don't discontinue this product ever. Happy customer :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have very sensitive skin. I have been using this fragrance-free cream for years. I've tried some of the department stores more expensive ones, but I find this cream to be as good...and you can't beat the price. I use it every night.

Silky smooth texture, has made a huge difference in my skin! I love how it soaks in and has a plump, not greasy effect. Best for night and mornings if not wearing makeup — not suitable for under makeup as it will pill up your product. It's PERFECT for “no makeup makeup” days, paired with a solid mascara and brow. It will smooth lines and fill in pores.

I never write reviews; probably because I've never really been impressed with any product before that prompted me to write a review. Until now. I purchased the Olay Micro Sculpt Cream today and I already love it! Plumper skin, visually reduced wrinkles and a glow I haven't seen in years. And I'm 55. Highly recommend and can't wait to try more Olay products!. ❤️

I live in a very dry climate and this is the best that I've found to moisturize skin. As a moisturizer this feels amazing when first applied and after using for a few days your skin feels soft and moist even when you skip a day.

I love this product speaking for my self only I have a under active thyroid and have tried just about everything from doctors cream, to expensive over the counter creams. Nothing was working my skin was very dry, flaky, scaly texture my makeup would not even stay on after reading all the reviews on this product I decided to try it.... This product worked for me I'm so in love with my skin now it's soft, smooth,and hydrated my makeup go's on flawless now. TY OLAY!!!!

I have been an Olay user for years. I was sure that the Regenerist Micro Sculpting cream would live up to the standards of prior products. I have purchased a total of 12 jars(3 unused so far) and have seen NO improvment or change as promised. I do not expect miracles at my age (71) but do expect some small and positive changes. Not happening with this product.

I have been using Regenerist Micro-sculpting cream for several months. When I meet someone who has not seen me in a few years, the comment is, "Wow you look great, you haven't changed!" I use is every day and I do see the changes in my skin. Thank you so much.

I just tried this cream and loved the way it made my face feel and look. Unfortunately the perfumed fragrance is so strong it gave me a headache and I had to return the cream to the store. I would LOVE it if Olay would make this in a Fragrance Free option. Until then, I can't use it.

I am at an age where the well set wrinkles are here to stay. But using the sculpting cream and night moisturizer plumps up those smaller lines and gives my aged skin more life than it's had in years. So although the wrinkles are beyond the point of no return, these products really improve my overall appearance. Should have tried it sooner!

I have used Olay for several years and have recently tried this Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Face Moisturizer. I love how hydrating it is and how it makes my skin feel supple after just a few days of use. I also especially love that it's fragrance-free as I tend to be allergic to harsh fragrances that many moisturizers come with. Although I am writing this review as part of Influenster #contest, I honestly like Olay as a product.

I have used Olay Regenerist products for years and I love them. They work really well and have kept my skin in really good condition. I wish I had paid for attention to my skin when I was younger but now I am doing so with Olay. This Micro-Scuplting Cream really does make a difference too. I went without it for a month and my skin showed a big difference. I don't want to do that again. Love, love. love this stuff.

I finally found a product that works and it didn't cost a small fortune! Regenerist Microsculpting Cream is the best product I ever tried. I'm 60 and I have those horrid marionette lines below my nose and around my mouth. After about one week I noticed that they were not as noticeable and now, one month later they're barely there. I don't know how OLAY did it, but this product is a miracle cream. I'm so happy and my self confidence has gone up several notches. Now I'm going to try the Overnight Wrinkle Cream!

What a great product... I have been using it for a few weeks and I am starting to see the difference.It is defiantly starting to firm up my face,and moisturizing deep into my skin.Being unscented makes it perfect for me because my eyes tend to be sensitive to fragrances. I can't wait to see what the future results will be.

I am 64 years old and live in the desert. My skin was dry and tired looking. At my daughters urging I tried this product and now two years later I feel my skin looks bright and healthy and I am told I look much younger than my age. I am very happy with the results and would recommend it to any woman.

A good friend gave me my first bottle of this cream. I am not into all the hype and so it sat on my counter until I had run out of my very expensive department store cream. I saw the difference for myself the next morning. By the time I had used it a week I had friends and coworkers asking me what I was up to as I was glowing! Many wanted to know what new make up I was using so they could go and buy it too! I had to tell them it was OLAY! Thanks for making such a wonderful product and making me feel like a GODESS!

This product is exactly as advertised. I could see a visisble difference in the texture of my skin and my sagging jawline actually appears to be lifted and smoother. I am the biggest skeptic EVER about most product advertising - I am amazed and grateful for the results I got from this cream. It smells wonderful and I won't be without this one!!!

I really liked the regenerist product and felt like it really did a good job of moisturizing my skin. It didn't make me break out and really absorbed into my skin nicely. When I woke up the next morning my skin felt moisturized and bright. I'm not sure if it has all of the fancy ingredients like peptides, AHAs, etc. but for the price point it's a great product. #Contest

I was looking forward to using this after reading the reviews. This broke my skin out and the itching was bad. I'm sure it works well for some, but I was allergic to something in this cream. I have used other Olay products in the past and never had a problem. The regenerate line just doesn't work on my skin.

I was looking through my magazine and came across a sample of this product. I tried it on and the texture of this product was nice and smooth. I love the scent of it and as I applied on the product, I noticed my skin looked so much awake and youthful! I say thus because usually I look tired and my skin looks oily. But this product made my skin looked smooth and soft. Loving it! Now I'm hooked and I plan to purchase this moisturizer tomorrow !!

I had to stop using the product becuase I found the fragrance overwhelming and the product increased the redness in my face. Perfumes are known to cause problems with sensitive skin types. So far, I've only been able to use the frangrance free Serum without the issue of redness and I LOVE IT! More fragrant free products would be greatly appreciated!

I would most likely continue to use this product if it wasn't for the perfume in it. I really hope they come out with a fragrance free version, this one really bothered me. Otherwise I thought it was great, not worth walking around with a headache though. :( Did give my skin a beautiful glow and stayed plump and moisturized all day.

I love this cream! I have tried every cream you can think of even creams over $100. But this one is amazing! The first time i started using it someone came up to me and said wow your skin looks really good. I ran out of this cream the other day and had to use something i just had as backup and i could tell the difference it was like my face was thirsty for it lol! anyways it's not about spending tons of money on high priced name brands but what works for you and this one definitely does!! Thanks Olay

I have used the Microsculpting cream now for three weeks. Ihave really tried to like it but I don't. It is very sticky on my skin and I have pimples that are forming under my skin and blackheads that I haven't had since my younger yrs. I am 57 yrs. old.

I have been using regenerist and other Olay products since I was 14 years old. On the advice of my mom. (rest her soul) She always had the most beautiful flawlwss skin. Part genetics and definately all Olay products as a committed routine. Thank You, Este

I used the Olay Regenerating Moisturizer and then saw this in an ad. Tried it and will use nothing else ever again. Its WONDERFUL. Does everything its advertised to do and then some. Everyone noticed a difference. Worth every penny. Can't wait to try the new eye roller stuff.

I learned a lot about skin care products a few years ago as I was selling them for a direct sales company and I know that hyaluronic acid and amino peptides are the best ingredients to plump skin and renew cells. I recently researched hyaluronic acid and am completely convinced it brings life back to cells. I love what this cream is doing to my face.

I had really bad wrinkles under my eyes and forehead. Nothing I had tried worked including those very expensive professional products. I've been using this cream for a couple months now and what amazing results. Most of my wrinkles have visibly disappeared and I could not be happier. I'm 51 yrs old and am told I look 15 yrs younger all the time, thank you OLAY Regenerist!

I have a combination oily skin and needed to get started working on my anti-aging skin regime. I started really late, I'm now in my mid-40s. I find this product a little too thick and greasy. I have to switch to a lighter one. When I go get my facials, the therapist says that I have millia and need to change my moisturizer. I was using the regenerist :|
Product met my expectations.
I have used this cream for awhile now. Like how it makes your face feel especially after a shower.
Liked the bonus pack of cleansing cloths so much we bought more. Olay Regenerist Moisturizer has been great!
Especially like that it is unscented. Scents are the prime reason I stayed away from Oil of Olay products. I also like the unscented serum.

I like this product. I only use it at night before sleep. I use a different moisturizer during the day. I noticed my face looked more refreshed within about a week. I 'm sold and will keep purchasing this.
I have tried many wrinkle creams and this is the only one that hasnât broke me outâI have rosacea so I canât just put anything on my face! Thanks olay, Iâll continue using this product!
Started using this product a couple years ago. Love how it works, but the plastic under the top cover is way too hard to take off. There's got to be a better way.
Finally! I found something that cleared up my dry flaky forehead and chin area! This works great without leaving a gross residue. Will definitely buy again.
Love this Olay product! It is better than my department store moisturizers! Smooth, creamy and hydrates your skin!!
Hydrates your skin very well. I have lines on my forehead and between my brows and this cream softens the lines so they are not as noticeable.

I purchased it to help my skin from aging and restore the moisture. It was winter time when I bought it, help immensely for restoring my skin and kept from drying out. I love how it makes my face feel!
Being using for a month. It's light weight and great under makeup. My result: no more breakout, even skin tone and younger looking skin. LADIES, ITS WORTH YOUR TIME AND MONEY
This is my favortie product of the regenerist collection. I use it everyday and have noticed my skin is firmer and looks soft and clean. I use it day and night. Highly recommend.
This cream is fabulous though the fragrance is so overwhelming that I cannot use it. If Olay develops this exact formula but with SPF 15 and no Fragrance I will be a life-long user!

If you are looking for a product that stands up to all it claims, this is the one. It really gives the face and neck a lift. I found it also moisturizes without feeling greasy and decreases redness on the cheeks.
I really enjoy this product! It has a really nice smoothing effect to it. It is one of the best moisturizers I've had! I recommend this for anyone with dry skin.

Since I can't afford a face lift. this has to be the next best thing! The Regenrist Micro-Sculpting Cream diminishes the appearance of my wrinkles and sagging jowls. I use it faithfully twice and day and don't ever want to be without it!
I have used this product from it's entry into the market. I am 81 years old and always told I look younger. Maybe it's my ballroom dancing, but my secret is my OLAY! Dancer
This product is not to use before your foundation in the morning. It will not supermoisturize. Your makeup will not glide over it. I love the night cream but this is disappointing to me.
I HAVE USED OLAY IN RED BOTTLE FOR OVER 6YEARS AND I SWEAR BY IT HITTING 70YRS.IDON'T HAVE WRINKLES UNDER EYE'S AROUND MY MOUTH THIS IS ALL I USE AT NITE .

I have yet to find out if this product works or not. It seems to go on evenly but it leaves a film on my face leaving my face feeling unclean it also clogs my pores somewhat.I will Overlook these things if the product works though but I will keep hope that these things will be fixed to better the product.

This product has always been a go-to for me. It helps smooth my skill and hydrate, creating a less visible wrinkles. I have seen it in many magazines independent reviews for best anti-wrinkle creams (and it's always the only affordable one). I recommend that they put vitamin c, tea extracts, and grape seed extract in their formula to make it even better. If they did this, it would be as good as the very expensive products.

I recently purchased Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Face Moisturizer, the night recovery moisturizer, eye moisturizer and the cleanser. I have only used it four days. I have to say I love how my skin feels and looks. I was at a high end department store yesterday with my mother. We tried some makeup samples and the sales lady complimented my skin. I told her what I was using and she was amazed as I am. I will keep you updated as time goes on. Happy to see what a few weeks will look like.
Easy to apply, skin looks much better, moisturizer is effective.
Great moisturizer and a great Jet price
Good ..not as good as Lancôme.
I have used olay product since I was a teen. I am now 62. Love love love, Regenerist products!
Good inexpensive moisturizer without scent!
It works Great. Just like it says.
Love this moisturizer been using it for year tried others but always return to olay
Love this moisturizer but do no understand why it costs so much. Very pricey!!
Excellent price. Prompt shipping

This stuff is awesome! I have always used high end, brand name products, such as Peter Thomas Roth, and ReVive. Due to my husband losing his job I've been looking for something to compare to those products, and this delivers! The Regenerist products work just as good at a fraction of the price! As a matter of fact when the economy improves, I do not intend to go back to buying those over priced products, because these work just as well, if not better. A very, very pleased customer!

Along with applying eye cream this facial micro sculpting cream is wonderful! Within minutes I felt a light tingling and tightening of the skin. I love the fragrance and the feel. It absorbs fast. You only need a little bit of this non-greasy wonder. The frangance is light and smells amazingly fresh. I will be using this for a long time.

My grandma has been using this product ever since I remember and she has perfect skin! So I've decided to follow in her footsteps and been using it for a few months now! I love the way my face feels after it. My face feels so much better and I younger! I love it! #Contest.

I started using this product a couple of months ago when I was delighted to find that it was available "fragrance free." I have been using Clinique products to avoid fragrances and I am very happy to be returning to Oil of Olay. I am writing this review in the hopes that the company will continue to support customers who do not feel that added fragrances are advantageous in skin care. Product provides great moisture especially for mature skin. Purchased the fragrance free serum as well!

This is the first face cream that truly delivers what it advertises. Priced much lower than department store brands and delivers all the benefits. There is a huge difference in my skin. Less sagging and more elasticity. I will be a forever customer:-)

So far I have enjoyed this product very much and have see a difference in the apprearance of my skin. I use both morning and evening. I would like to know if anyone thinks perhaps the regenerist night cream should be used at night and the micro-sculpting for during the day only. I would appreciate any suggestions you might have. I am 59 years young. Thank you!

Y'all (I'm from the South, so I have to say that), this product really works. I've been using it for about three months, and I can tell a difference in my jaw line (which was really starting to droop). The finer lines around my mouth and eyes are really reduced. I am so impressed with this product. I'll never give it up!

I started using this cream about two weeks ago, and I really like how it moisturizes my skin without making it feel oily. I know a lot of people are complaining about the smell, but I like it, and the most important thing to me is how it moisturizes my skin, not how it smells.

I like this product with one exception....THE FRAGRANCE! It is so overbearing and I cannot tolerate the smell for long. I do have allergies and this particular product definitely irritates my nose. I feel congested after applying this product. Please try to formulate this product without a fragrance. Otherwise I believe it works well.

I bought a jar this past spring, & noticed a difference after the first week. My skin is firmer, smoother, and the forehead wrinkles are less noticeable. I can even wear blush over it without foundation, and still look good. Even my family notices a difference! Thank you Olay for a great product. Diana

I have used the Microsculpting cream for over a year now. I love it. It leaves my skin feeling silky and soft. It gives me resiliance and a good feeling. I use it morning and night under my mineral foundation. I do not use an additional moistureizer or it gets too heavy. My foundation has a natural sunscreen so I am not missing out on that. I sell cosmetics for a drug store chain and I get many complements on my skin! I tell all that I use regenerist products and why! I absolutely sell the line because I use it!

I am 56 years old and have friends from my 8th grade class asking me if I get Botox; no kidding. They want to know why I have no wrinkles on my forehead or around my eyes. There is no question that Olay Regenerist MicroSculpting cream is the best product on the market at any price. I started to use Oil of Olay when I was 16, and 40 years later it's still the one brand I'm using.

When I first bought this I was scared because I have acne, oily, dermatitis and sensitive skin. I have been using this for a few weeks already and my jar is almost gone. Lets just say that I really like how it makes my skin look when I wake up and it does not irritate my acne. I do use acne medication below too but this works nice. I am not sure if it will remove wrinkles since it is my first jar but I love the feeling I get and the glow I get when I wake up. I mean so far this is my best night cream.

As a former model and account executive for some of the major fragrance and cosmetic companies in the world, I was accustomed to using high end products. Because of the recession, I needed to find an alternative for the interim. I have heard positive feedback on the Regenerist line and decided to try the Micro-sculpting cream. I was stunned! It is the most luxurious cream I have ever used and the results are impressive. Thank you Olay! You can now claim me as a loyal customer.

I have used Creme De La Mere for years. My facial skin is so dry that nothing else helped. I love Olay products and use many others. Once this cream came out i was in 7th heaven! Finally a product that moisturized my face all day without oiliness and didnt allow any dryness in. It is the single most coveted product i own/use. I love this so much, i pray it never stops being produced.

I hit the half century years old mark a couple of months ago, and after taking a close look in front of the mirror, i noticed a pronounced sagging under the chin into the neck area......thought i'd go ahead and try the new product. The hydra firming cream is already starting to show it really works. The sagginess is much less noticeable. Less expensive and safer than a face lift! Thank You Olay!
You will understand why it is the number one selling skin product. I have had the highest end and nothing compares to this cream .
I'm not sure it is any better than some cheaper creams, so far.
Easy to use...NO SMELL....Works well...Been using this for years... Love it..
Even strangers think I am 50 years old instead of 81.
I just started using this product. In the first two weeks, I've received so many compliments on how great my skin looks. I am 48 by the way.
This is very thick and greasy I put it on my skin and it makes it break out in acne because it closes the pores.
My second jar. Love the creme on my face. I use morning and night. My skin feels really smooth. Recommend this to everyone .
I love the way this product made my face feel after I took a shower I would apply to my face and neck
Just started using this about a week ago, but I can definitely see a difference! I couldn't be more pleased with this product!
the moisturizer left my skin feeling amazingly soft, it really unbelievable, i only used the sample but now i want to buy the it. ☺
The price point is excellent for this product. Don't have to buy expensive creams to make a difference!

I have very dry sensitive skin. Other moisturizers leave me with breakouts. This product has saved my skin! All the moisture and none of the irritation. I love the fresh clean scent. This product is amazing!
I put this product on my face and went to bed. The next morning I could already see a difference. I have been using it for a couple of weeks now and am very happy with the results.
This is an extremely good moisturizer. I really need a top notch moisturizer and this product is it. I have used many moisturizers but none have been better than this
I love this cream. I am 62 and my skin looks great. Not like I am 40 but darn good for 62.
This was the day cream that I ordered and it is correct and works very well.
Considering all of the hype, I wasn't as impressed with this as I had hoped to be.
I absolutely love this product. Been using it for years Thank you
Love it. Not greasy. I like the cleansing cloths which came with it too
I love this product! It leaves my skin feeling amazing and so soft! I would definitely recommend this, especially for those who have very dry skin! It's helped mine so much! #contest
I have a shallow spot just below my cheekbone and have been using this product for a couple weeks. The shallow spot is less noticeable . Seems to firm skin pretty good

This cream is one of the best products I have ever tried. I have used numerous products but within two weeks I was able to see a dramatic difference in the firmness and over all glow of my skin. It is the best product I've ever used!
This cream instantly tightens and brightens the skin. It energizes the complextion and you can feel your skin's texture get tighter right after you massage it in. I love this cream!
Excellent product.
Daily skincare
excellent product!

Skin types differs. People have different skin types especially on the face. The cream is nice and not grease but absorbs into the skin but the difference is that I'm having skin reactions ( pimples ). My face look clear and firm but the Olay causes breakouts( pimples). It might work perfectly for others.

I have very dry skin. I normally use a heavy moisturizer but I wanted to try a facial cream that also helped with anti-aging. I could tell immediately after applying that it was not going to be moisturizing enough for my skin. I tried it for two days both day and night. I went back to my standard Cerave moisturizing cream. For now I will just use the olay at night and apply my moisturizing cream ontop. I don't believe I will be repurchasing.

I applied to my whole face, emphasizing my forehead. Everything was fine until the next afternoon. I applied makeup this morning and by 5 or 6 pm, I felt a BUNCH of tiny bumps and red blotches on my forehead. I am not sure if it was a fluke, I will definitely try again, but my skin Never breaks out. My skin has handled all different types of products and is normally very dry. I am kind of scared of what the other products might do ?! Help !

I have been using Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream for about two weeks and my skin is starting to look and feel great. I was surprised at how fast I started seeing result, loving it My skin looks and feels much better. I received this product free as part of an Insiders Program

I absolutely love how Olay Regenerist makes my skin feel. In just a few weeks away has made my skin feel smoother and look brighter and more even in tone. I've noticed that my wrinkles are much less noticeable and even my friends noticed a difference.

I have been testing this product as a member of The Insiders Net for free in return for my honest opinion. After using this product for a week and a half, I am noticing some subtle differences in my facial skin. My faces feels firmer, looks brighter and more even toned. I am highly impressed with this product. Definitely recommend this to anyone.

The finish on this is SO powdery. It made my skin feel dirty. I did not like that at all. I'm usually so pleased with Olay products, too, so this was a bit of a disappointment. This also did not moisturize at all. My skin was just as dry as before. I also don't get what this cream was supposed to "sculpt." It did not firm up, tone, or "lift" my face, neck, or hands at all. For something that's fragrance-free, there is a definite smell. I did like the smell, but I don't care to give my face, neck, or hands a dirty feel just to smell good.

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream gave amazing RESULTS! It's inexpensive, softly silky smooth, & absorbs so freshly! I've seen dramatic changes throughout my entire face! Much firmer filled in skin that looks replenished, lines on my forehead have disappeared, and this even works great as a primer! I never in my life got results from ANY products I have purchased in the past up until NOW! I carry this everywhere!

love using olay regenerist. My skin always gets dry, and with olay, not anymore. Ive really noticed a softer and smoother appearance on my skin after just a four weeks. I use this before going to bed and in the morning it's a brand new feeling to the skin, i use and love the fact that theres vitamin C in it. If you dont believe me, try it for yourself and you'll love your skin! "I was able to review Olay products as a part of The Insiders program"

I have to say that I had to google how to open the Olay Regenerist jar! I read the review below and was happy to see that someone was just as frustrated as I was. Definitely need to go back to the drawing board and figure out different packaging for this product. I have used the Olay regenerist serum for years and decided to switch it up and try this. Excited about the product just wish it were easier to use!

I used this product a few years ago and recently wanted to try it again after using more expensive brands, but I have bought two jars and haven't been able to get either one open after turning the plastic lid clockwise. I returned them because it was too frustrating to try and open the jars - I would recommend finding a different way of getting the lid off and until then I will not be purchasing it again.

This is a lovely moisturizer. I use it at night after the Miracle Boost Concentrate, and my skin looks plump and hydrated in the morning. I love the Regenerist products, and use many of them. My only complaint is that they don't have as many anti-aging ingredients in them as they used to. However they still make my skin look younger, so I continue to use them. Would like an amino-pepetide complex i serum or toner type product to be available in this line, containing carnosine, green tea, etc.

I have used Oil of Olay products for some time, starting out with the first pink lotion. I loved it then and still do today. I now use the Regenerist to help with sun damage and fine lines. It goes on smoothly, it's not greasy, and it dries fast! I use it everyday, and I definitely see a difference. I put my makeup on after it dries and my skin looks Youthful and refreshed. It smells nice and it works for me! #contest

I enjoy learning about skin care products, always looking for the magic fix to my encreasing face wrinkles. Since I am approaching 70, I think I have tried numerous options, but until you actually have wrinkles, you do not know how they will work.
